name: Milestone #1 Gameplay Prototype: Bounce Adventure
description:
Bounce Adventure is a 2d top down puzzle game. Players assume the role of Bounce, a spherical character who must save his friends from the impending doom of the Polygonites, evil beings who will stop at nothing to turn the world into a sharp, angled abomination. Bounce must rescue his fellow Spherians by launching himself through treacherous environments, avoiding hazards and traps set by the Polygonites along the way. Only united with his brethren, can Bounce have a chance at returning the world to rounded form. 

**HOW TO PLAY**

1. Use the mouse (click and drag) to launch Bounce around the level

2. Use Bounce to collect his fellow friends in the level

3. Avoid Polygonite enemies! Some can hurt you!

4. After collecting all of your Spherian friends, make your way to the exit!
